sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: depmod, genksyms, insmod, insmod_ksymoops_clean, kallsyms (link to insmod), kernelversion, ksyms, lsmod (link to insmod), modinfo, modprobe (link to insmod) and rmmod

sect4.title: depmod
sect4.para: depmod handles dependency descriptions for loadable kernel modules.

sect4.title: genksyms
sect4.para: genksyms reads (on standard input) the output from gcc -E source.c and generates a file containing version information.

sect4.title: insmod
sect4.para: insmod installs a loadable module in the running kernel.

sect4.title: insmod_ksymoops_clean
sect4.para: insmod_ksymoops_clean deletes saved ksyms and modules not accessed in 2 days.

sect4.title: kallsyms
sect4.para: kallsyms extracts all kernel symbols for debugging.

sect4.title: kernelversion
sect4.para: kernelversion reports the major version of the running kernel.

sect4.title: lsmod
sect4.para: lsmod shows information about all loaded modules.

sect4.title: modinfo
sect4.para: modinfo examines an object file associated with a kernel module and displays any information that it can glean.

sect4.title: modprobe
sect4.para: Modprobe uses a Makefile-like dependency file, created by depmod, to automatically load the relevant module(s) from the set of modules available in predefined directory trees.

sect4.title: rmmod
sect4.para: rmmod unloads loadable modules from the running kernel.
